message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get as close to my budget of $10000 as possible.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $8250. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $7800. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
